dct_alternative_sm: The Dismemberment of Germany From the empire, five and a half million Germans are to be separated in East and West!
dct_description_sm: Shows (by color) land to be separated immediately without popular vote, with popular vote; and land to be immediately under hostile administration, popular vote only after fifteen years of foreign domination.
Also occupied areas; "Brückköpfe," which after certain time sections are returned on fulfillment of the conditions; and the 50 kilometer zone, in which neither troops nor fortifications can be kept.
Indicated by arrows at certain colored areas of the map: coal, potatoes, milk, bread, iron, potash.
